summary: Build an interactive Valentine-themed game-like website with a Fortnite/Valorant-style progression UI, featuring multiple story levels, mini-games, and a final Valentine proposal flow.
architectural_notes: Website experience is structured as sequential game-like screens/levels with a defined mood progression: Fun ‚Üí Nostalgia ‚Üí Comfort ‚Üí Emotional ‚Üí Proposal ‚Üí Celebration.
UI direction: Fortnite/Valorant-style progression screens, popups, XP/achievement feedback.
Interactive branching behavior: Proposal screen includes 'TRY AGAIN' that increases the prominence/size of 'YES' option.
